name: Ezra's Legacy Demo
description:
This is the first demo for the upcoming game Ezra's Legacy, containing only one single game level.

Ezra's Legacy is an action packed 2d platformer inspired in classics from the eighties gaming era, with 8-bit aesthetics, great soundtrack and awesome gameplay. You play as Ruby, a young apprentice witch whose apprenticeship is abruptly interrupted by having her aunt and master Lea kidnapped by the fearsome Dark Council.

With still much to learn but already a lot of confidence, Ruby embarks on a journey across the land to search for her master and, unknowingly, uncover the Council plot regarding the legendary witch, Ezra, and her legacy.

If you love fun and simple games, but with challenging difficulty, polished retro stile graphics, highly hummable chiptune music and simple but engaging mechanics, then Ezra's Legacy is just for you!

Features

  • Enjoy Ezra's legacy unique art stile, where art, music, story and gameplay work together to bring you a harmonious and wonderful gaming experience.
  • Challenge your platforming skills as you pursue and defeat each member of the Dark Council.
  • Enter "in the zone" while listening to each of the highly memorable and hummable tunes from the game.
  • Equip Ruby with the gems recovered from each Council member, granting you either an attack spell or a passive ability
  • Explore an immersive game map where secrets can be hidden in any corner.
  • Upgrade ruby with lost Ezra artifacts, granting her new gameplay abilities.
